reviews.review_msg: This course is an easy course. Clear grading rubric. i didn't put a lot of effort in this course. The prof is not that difficult but he is good at making simple things complicated. He is responsible and talks to students. but it is a lot of homework. if you follow what he says in the class, you are fine.

the course is manageable—formatting and econ content are easy, wating paper. But tough grader: one classmate chose a complex macro topic and trimmed less essential parts to fit time and suit a non-beginner audience. Still, the prof harshly cut marks for font size, lack of gestures, and "unclear" logic, despite a clear and well-structured talk.

Writing for economics course.

His feedback on an assignment: “This is a math question. Why so many words?”

Uhhh, maybe because it's a writing class?!?

Egotistical, stuck-up, and not fun to be around.
